cards.name: Scion of Ugin
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: For hundreds of years Ugin slept, encased in the cocoon of stone and magic Sarkhan had created using a shard of a Zendikari hedron. As Ugin lay dormant, his spectral guardians kept vigil.

cards.name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
cards.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Martyred for worshipping her ancestors, she now walks among them.

foreignPrintings.name: 族樹の精霊、アナフェンザ
Anafenza, Espírito da Árvore de Família

cards.name: Arashin Foremost
cards.text:
Double strike
Whenever Arashin Foremost enters the battlefield or attacks, another target Warrior creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "I would gladly give my life if it would inspire my clan to victory."

foreignPrintings.name: アラシンの先頭に立つ者

cards.name: Artful Maneuver
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Aven Sunstriker
cards.text:
Flying
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Megamorph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Aven Tactician
cards.text:
Flying
When Aven Tactician enters the battlefield, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The aven are admired, for they are able to fly with the dragons.

cards.name: Battle Mastery
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor:
"There is elegance in all the Ojutai do-even their killing."
-Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

cards.name: Center Soul
cards.text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Champion of Arashin
cards.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: "The blood of Dromoka and the blood of my veins are the same."

cards.name: Dragon Hunter
cards.text:
Protection from Dragons
Dragon Hunter can block Dragons as though it had reach.
cards.flavor: "Dromoka has taught me the secrets of her kind, that I might use them in her service."

cards.name: Dragon's Eye Sentry
cards.text: Defender, first strike
cards.flavor: Even the humblest guard of Ojutai's strongholds ponders the puzzles of the Great Teacher's lessons.

cards.name: Dromoka Captain
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Dromoka Captain attacks, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: "We fight not out of fear, but for honor."

cards.name: Dromoka Dunecaster
cards.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature without flying.
cards.flavor: "The dragonlords rule the tempests of the skies. Here in the wastes, the storms are mine to command."

cards.name: Dromoka Warrior
cards.flavor: Dromoka has regard for the humans who serve under her. In return for her protection, they obey with steadfast loyalty, acting as weapons for her and her scalelords against the other clans.

cards.name: Echoes of the Kin Tree
cards.text: {2}{W}: Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Even after Anafenza was executed, many secretly maintained their beliefs in the old ways.

cards.name: Enduring Victory
cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature. Bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"My dragonlord is immortal. Most dragons are not."
-Kadri, Dromoka warrior

cards.name: Fate Forgotten
cards.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: When Sarkhan saved Ugin in Tarkir's past, it changed Tarkir's future. The Sultai no longer exist, having been supplanted by the dragonlord Silumgar and his clan.

cards.name: Glaring Aegis
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Glaring Aegis enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

cards.name: Gleam of Authority
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on other creatures you control.
Enchanted creature has vigilance and "{W}, {T}: Bolster 1." (To bolster 1, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Graceblade Artisan
cards.text: Graceblade Artisan gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
cards.flavor:
"Can you catch a snowflake on the edge of your blade? Her sword has snagged an entire blizzard."
-Zogye, Ojutai mystic

cards.name: Great Teacher's Decree
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Herald of Dromoka
cards.text:
Vigilance
Other Warrior creatures you control have vigilance.
cards.flavor: The trumpeters of Arashin are ever alert in their watch over the Great Aerie.

cards.name: Hidden Dragonslayer
cards.text:
Lifelink
Megamorph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Hidden Dragonslayer is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater an opponent controls.

cards.name: Lightwalker
cards.text: Lightwalker has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor:
"The greatest gift Dromoka gives is the ability to fly without wings."
-Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

cards.name: Misthoof Kirin
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Megamorph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: It heralded Sarkhan's return to Tarkir's present.

cards.name: Myth Realized
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a lore counter on Myth Realized.
{2}{W}: Put a lore counter on Myth Realized.
{W}: Until end of turn, Myth Realized becomes a Monk Avatar creature in addition to its other types and gains "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lore counters on it."

cards.name: Ojutai Exemplars
cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose one -
• Tap target creature.
• Ojutai Exemplars gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn.
• Exile Ojutai Exemplars, then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

cards.name: Orator of Ojutai
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Defender, flying
When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, draw a card.

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor:
"If I fight, I might step on a butterfly. That would be sad."
-Krowg of Qal Sisma

cards.name: Profound Journey
cards.text:
Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Radiant Purge
cards.text: Exile target multicolored creature or multicolored enchantment.
cards.flavor: The Shifting Wastes are Dromoka's domain. She will not tolerate intruders.

cards.name: Resupply
cards.text:
You gain 6 life.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"If the scalelords are the brains of Dromoka's army, the supply caravans are its beating heart."
-Baihir, Dromoka mage

cards.name: Sandcrafter Mage
cards.text: When Sandcrafter Mage enters the battlefield, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: With heat, sand can form a delicate work of art; with pressure, an impenetrable bulwark.

cards.name: Sandstorm Charger
cards.text: Megamorph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"May our foes choke upon its horns!"
-Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

foreignPrintings.name: Batailleur de la tempête de sable

cards.name: Scale Blessing
cards.text: Bolster 1, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. (To bolster 1, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"Your bravery honors us all."
-Dromoka, translated from Draconic

cards.name: Secure the Wastes
cards.text: Create X 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.
cards.flavor:
"The Shifting Wastes provide our clan eternal protection. It is our duty to return the favor."
-Kadri, Dromoka warrior

cards.name: Shieldhide Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Megamorph {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Shieldhide Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

cards.name: Silkwrap
cards.text: When Silkwrap enters the battlefield, exile target creature with mana value 3 or less an opponent controls until Silkwrap leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)
cards.flavor: Better scarves than scars.

cards.name: Strongarm Monk
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"His companions are wise to follow him, for his foes dare not stand in his way."
-Zhiada, Dirgur protector

cards.name: Student of Ojutai
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "Human enlightenment is a firefly that sparks in the night. Dragon enlightenment is a beacon that disperses all darkness."

cards.name: Sunscorch Regent
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape."
-Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

cards.name: Surge of Righteousness
cards.text: Destroy target black or red creature that's attacking or blocking. You gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: Though she stood alone, she struck with the force of an army.

cards.name: Territorial Roc
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
"Such lesser creatures must be purged from the sky. What use do they have but to help channel the lightning of our mighty dragonlord?"
-Gvar Barzeel, Kolaghan warrior

cards.name: Ancient Carp
cards.flavor:
"Why eat now what could one day grow into a feast?"
-Ojutai, translated from Draconic

cards.name: Anticipate
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor: "When I have meditated on all outcomes, my opponent has no recourse."

cards.name: Belltoll Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, hexproof
Megamorph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Belltoll Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

cards.name: Blessed Reincarnation
cards.text:
Exile target creature an opponent controls. That player reveals cards from the top of their library until a creature card is revealed. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into their library.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Clone Legion
cards.text: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
cards.flavor: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.

cards.name: Contradict
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Those who question Ojutai may not like the answers they receive.

cards.name: Dance of the Skywise
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue Dragon Illusion with base power and toughness 4/4, loses all abilities, and gains flying.
cards.flavor: The Ojutai believe in the Great Wheel: those who best serve the dragonlord are destined to be reborn as dragons.

cards.name: Dirgur Nemesis
cards.text:
Defender
Megamorph {6}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Dragonlord's Prerogative
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, this spell can't be countered.
Draw four cards.

cards.name: Elusive Spellfist
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Elusive Spellfist gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Learn to see an obstacle from a new perspective. Underneath, for example."
-Chanyi, Ojutai monk

cards.name: Encase in Ice
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant red or green creature
When Encase in Ice enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.name: Glint
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor: Rakshasa waste no opportunity to display their wealth and power, even in the midst of a sorcerous duel.

cards.name: Gudul Lurker
cards.text:
Gudul Lurker can't be blocked.
Megamorph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The small are mostly ignored by dragons.

cards.name: Gurmag Drowner
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Gurmag Drowner exploits a creature, look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

foreignPrintings.name: グルマグの溺れさせるもの

cards.name: Icefall Regent
cards.text:
Flying
When Icefall Regent enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Icefall Regent.
Spells your opponents cast that target Icefall Regent cost {2} more to cast.

cards.name: Illusory Gains
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, attach Illusory Gains to that creature.

cards.name: Learn from the Past
cards.text:
Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"I've been told my whole life that the great Ojutai holds all knowledge, but I wonder what our forebears knew."
-Narset

cards.name: Living Lore
cards.text:
As Living Lore enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Living Lore's power and toughness are each equal to the exiled card's mana value.
Whenever Living Lore deals combat damage, you may sacrifice it. If you do, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Mirror Mockery
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature. Exile that token at end of combat.
cards.flavor: Who you are constantly runs toward who you will be.

cards.name: Monastery Loremaster
cards.text:
Megamorph {5}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Monastery Loremaster is turned face up, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Mystic Meditation
cards.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a creature card.
cards.flavor:
"Still the mind and quiet the heart. Only then will you hear the Multiverse's great truths."
-Narset

cards.name: Negate
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.
cards.flavor:
"You cannot be an Ojutai monk. They prize wisdom and skill, and you have neither."
-Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

cards.name: Ojutai Interceptor
cards.text:
Flying
Megamorph {3}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: "Though I may soar, I could never fly as high as the dragons."

cards.name: Ojutai's Breath
cards.text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Ojutai's Summons
cards.text:
Create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Palace Familiar
cards.text:
Flying
When Palace Familiar dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The most profound secrets lie in the darkest places of the world. It can be prudent to make use of another set of eyes."
-Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

cards.name: Profaner of the Dead
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Profaner of the Dead exploits a creature, return to their owners' hands all creatures your opponents control with toughness less than the exploited creature's toughness.

cards.name: Qarsi Deceiver
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}. Spend this mana only to cast a face-down creature spell, pay a mana cost to turn a manifested creature face up, or pay a morph cost. (A megamorph cost is a morph cost.)

cards.name: Reduce in Stature
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 0/2.
cards.flavor: A dragon learns humility only in the moments before its death.

cards.name: Shorecrasher Elemental
cards.text:
{U}: Exile Shorecrasher Elemental, then return it to the battlefield face down under its owner's control.
{1}: Shorecrasher Elemental gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.
Megamorph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

foreignPrintings.name: Elemental de la cresta de ola

cards.name: Sidisi's Faithful
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Sidisi's Faithful exploits a creature, return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "I tire of your prattle, and your face."

cards.name: Sight Beyond Sight
cards.text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Silumgar Sorcerer
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Silumgar Sorcerer exploits a creature, counter target creature spell.

cards.name: Silumgar Spell-Eater
cards.text:
Megamorph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Silumgar Spell-Eater is turned face up, counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

foreignPrintings.name: シルムガルの呪文喰い

cards.name: Silumgar's Scorn
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, counter that spell instead.

cards.name: Skywise Teachings
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, create a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: Ojutai's words must be translated from Draconic before his students can benefit from their wisdom.

cards.name: Stratus Dancer
cards.text:
Flying
Megamorph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Stratus Dancer is turned face up, counter target instant or sorcery spell.

cards.name: Taigam's Strike
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Updraft Elemental
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
"It slips through the smallest cracks in the mountain, emerging whole and unfettered. There is nowhere it cannot go, for what can hold back the air itself?"
-Chanyi, Ojutai monk

cards.name: Void Squall
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Youthful Scholar
cards.text: When Youthful Scholar dies, draw two cards.
cards.flavor:
"Too dumb, and you end up a sibsig. Too smart, and you end up a meal. Mediocrity is the key to a long life."
-Mogai, Silumgar noble

cards.name: Zephyr Scribe
cards.text:
{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Zephyr Scribe.
cards.flavor:
"Ojutai's rule has allowed Tarkir's monks to learn from the truly enlightened."
-Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Acid-Spewer Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, deathtouch
Megamorph {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Acid-Spewer Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

cards.name: Ambuscade Shaman
cards.text:
Whenever Ambuscade Shaman or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Dash {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Blood-Chin Fanatic
cards.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another Warrior creature: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
cards.flavor: "We are as brutal as our dragonlord. We strike like wild lightning and feast on human flesh."

cards.name: Blood-Chin Rager
cards.text: Whenever Blood-Chin Rager attacks, Warrior creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor: Kolaghan blades rarely stay clean for long.

cards.name: Butcher's Glee
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

cards.name: Coat with Venom
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor:
"Every Silumgar blade carries the blessing of our dragonlord."
-Xathi the Infallible

cards.name: Corpseweft
cards.text: {1}{B}, Exile one or more creature cards from your graveyard: Create a tapped X/X black Zombie Horror creature token, where X is twice the number of cards exiled this way.
cards.flavor: Sidisi hated to limit her options.

cards.name: Damnable Pact
cards.text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.
cards.flavor:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
-Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

cards.name: Deadly Wanderings
cards.text: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch and lifelink.
cards.flavor:
"Seclusion is only an option for the strong."
-Sorin Markov

cards.name: Death Wind
cards.text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I am a dragonslayer for Lord Silumgar. There is no dragon save him whom I fear."
-Xathi the Infallible

cards.name: Deathbringer Regent
cards.text:
Flying
When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

cards.name: Defeat
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
cards.flavor:
"Wars are decided one life at a time."
-Gvar Barzeel, Kolaghan warrior

cards.name: Duress
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Sarkhan was eager to take vengeance on Zurgo until he saw how lowly his old foe had become.

cards.name: Dutiful Attendant
cards.text: When Dutiful Attendant dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: The dragon who eats the last head in the basket is entitled to the servant's.

cards.name: Flatten
cards.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Like their dragonlord, the Kolaghan take no trophies. They find true fulfillment only in the battle itself, in clash of steel and thunder of hooves.

cards.name: Foul Renewal
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the toughness of the card returned this way.
cards.flavor: The cycle of life and death is rarely pretty.

cards.name: Foul-Tongue Invocation
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, you gain 4 life.

cards.name: Foul-Tongue Shriek
cards.text: Target opponent loses 1 life for each attacking creature you control. You gain that much life.
cards.flavor: Foul-Tongue shamans draw their powers from a dark twisting of the Draconic language.

cards.name: Gravepurge
cards.text:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Lord Silumgar has given you a second chance to please him."
-Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

cards.name: Hand of Silumgar
cards.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Silumgar trains those whom he favors in his magic, granting them the ability to spread his disdain across the land.

cards.name: Hedonist's Trove
cards.text:
When Hedonist's Trove enters the battlefield, exile target opponent's graveyard.
You may play lands from among cards exiled with Hedonist's Trove.
You may cast spells from among cards exiled with Hedonist's Trove. You can't cast more than one spell this way each turn.

cards.name: Kolaghan Skirmisher
cards.text: Dash {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
cards.flavor: Kolaghan's army rushes from kill to kill, desperate to avoid the dragon's wrath.

cards.name: Marang River Skeleton
cards.text:
{B}: Regenerate Marang River Skeleton.
Megamorph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The gurgling of the Marang conceals both footsteps and screams.

cards.name: Marsh Hulk
cards.text: Megamorph {6}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: Now vengeance is his sole purpose.

cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.text: Target player discards two cards.
cards.flavor:
"The Ojutai are my favorite victims. They have so much knowledge to lose."
-Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

cards.name: Minister of Pain
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Minister of Pain exploits a creature, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Draconic words need not be shouted. A whisper will suffice.

cards.name: Pitiless Horde
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
Dash {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Qarsi Sadist
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Qarsi Sadist exploits a creature, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: Dying for the greater good still hurts.

cards.name: Rakshasa Gravecaller
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Rakshasa Gravecaller exploits a creature, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
cards.flavor: Debts to rakshasa linger beyond death.

foreignPrintings.name: ラクシャーサの墓呼び

cards.name: Reckless Imp
cards.text:
Flying
Reckless Imp can't block.
Dash {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Risen Executioner
cards.text:
Risen Executioner can't block.
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
You may cast Risen Executioner from your graveyard if you pay {1} more to cast it for each other creature card in your graveyard.

cards.name: Self-Inflicted Wound
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a green or white creature. If that player does, they lose 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"Worse than watching the cruelest deed is watching it done by your own hand."
-Baihir, Dromoka mage

cards.name: Shambling Goblin
cards.text: When Shambling Goblin dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle."
-Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

cards.name: Sibsig Icebreakers
cards.text: When Sibsig Icebreakers enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"I almost envy them. They can't get frostbite."
-Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

cards.name: Sidisi, Undead Vizier
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Sidisi, Undead Vizier exploits a creature, you may search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

foreignPrintings.name: アンデッドの大臣、シディシ

cards.name: Silumgar Assassin
cards.text:
Creatures with power greater than Silumgar Assassin's power can't block it.
Megamorph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Silumgar Assassin is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 3 or less an opponent controls.

cards.name: Silumgar Butcher
cards.text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Silumgar Butcher exploits a creature, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Silumgar takes pride in the diversity of his sibsig.

cards.name: Ukud Cobra
cards.text: Deathtouch
cards.flavor:
"The Silumgar hide behind the deadly wildlife of their swamps. They'd rather scheme in their jungle palaces than face us."
-Khibat, Kolaghan warrior

cards.name: Ultimate Price
cards.text: Destroy target monocolored creature.
cards.flavor:
"The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself."
-Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

cards.name: Virulent Plague
cards.text: Creature tokens get -2/-2.
cards.flavor:
"This pestilence robs us of glorious death in battle. We starve to death with full bellies and drown trying to slake our unnatural thirst."
-Kerai Hatesinger, Kolaghan warrior

cards.name: Vulturous Aven
cards.text:
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

cards.name: Wandering Tombshell
cards.flavor: The crumbling temples on the tortoise's back are monuments to the decadence of the ancient Sultai. Though it harkens back to the era of the khans, Silumgar allows it to walk his territory as a warning to those who would oppose him.

cards.name: Atarka Efreet
cards.text:
Megamorph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Atarka Efreet is turned face up, it deals 1 damage to any target.

foreignPrintings.name: アタルカのイフリート

cards.name: Atarka Pummeler
cards.text: Formidable - {3}{R}{R}: Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.name: Berserkers' Onslaught
cards.text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
cards.flavor:
"Atarka's people starve while she feasts upon the bounty of their hunts. They must conquer ever more lands just for the sake of their own subsistence."
-Arel, Unseen Whisperer

cards.name: Commune with Lava
cards.text: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
cards.flavor: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.

cards.name: Crater Elemental
cards.text:
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Crater Elemental: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
Formidable - {2}{R}: Crater Elemental has base power 8 until end of turn. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

cards.name: Descent of the Dragons
cards.text: Destroy any number of target creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
cards.flavor: Dragons emerge from tempests fully formed and terribly hungry.

cards.name: Draconic Roar
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Dragon Fodder
cards.text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
cards.flavor: Atarka goblins meet their demise as readily as their Temur counterparts did, but usually under big, winged shadows.

cards.name: Dragon Tempest
cards.text:
Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

cards.name: Dragon Whisperer
cards.text:
{R}: Dragon Whisperer gains flying until end of turn.
{1}{R}: Dragon Whisperer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Formidable - {4}{R}{R}: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

cards.name: Dragonlord's Servant
cards.text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

cards.name: Hardened Berserker
cards.text: Whenever Hardened Berserker attacks, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor:
"Just let him loose and follow the charge."
-Yikaro, Atarka warrior

cards.name: Impact Tremors
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor:
"If their ears are to the ground, we will make them bleed!"
-Taklai, Kolaghan warrior

cards.name: Ire Shaman
cards.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ire Shaman is turned face up, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Kindled Fury
cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"It is most honorable to use every part of the animals we kill . . . especially if we use them to annihilate our enemies."
-Surrak, the Hunt Caller

cards.name: Kolaghan Aspirant
cards.text: Whenever Kolaghan Aspirant becomes blocked by a creature, Kolaghan Aspirant deals 1 damage to that creature.
cards.flavor: She answers the call of the Crave, the desire for battle sated only by bloodshed.

cards.name: Kolaghan Forerunners
cards.text:
Trample
Kolaghan Forerunners's power is equal to the number of creatures you control.
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Kolaghan Stormsinger
cards.text:
Haste
Megamorph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Kolaghan Stormsinger is turned face up, target creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Lightning Berserker
cards.text:
{R}: Lightning Berserker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Dash {R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Lose Calm
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste and menace until end of turn. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor: A lifetime of discipline forsaken in a moment of rage.

cards.name: Magmatic Chasm
cards.text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Our shamans assert their mastery over the land, thwarting the lesser clans' attempts to stand in the way of our dragonlord."
-Allek, Atarka hunter

cards.name: Qal Sisma Behemoth
cards.text: Qal Sisma Behemoth can't attack or block unless you pay {2}.
cards.flavor:
"It hunts grand game for Atarka, and when the time comes, it will become a mighty feast."
-Surrak, the Hunt Caller

foreignPrintings.name: カル・シスマのビヒモス

cards.name: Rending Volley
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Rending Volley deals 4 damage to target white or blue creature.
cards.flavor: The sky offers few hiding places.

cards.name: Roast
cards.text: Roast deals 5 damage to target creature without flying.
cards.flavor:
"Intruders in the lands of Atarka have but two choices: be consumed by fire, or be consumed by maw."
-Ulnok, Atarka shaman

cards.name: Sabertooth Outrider
cards.text:
Trample
Formidable - Whenever Sabertooth Outrider attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, Sabertooth Outrider gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Sarkhan's Rage
cards.text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.
cards.flavor: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

cards.name: Sarkhan's Triumph
cards.text: Search your library for a Dragon creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Sarkhan gazed on the world around him, the dragons sweeping through its skies, and joy kindled like a fire in his soul.

cards.name: Screamreach Brawler
cards.text: Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
cards.flavor: "My dragonlord's lightning will dance upon your bones!"

cards.name: Seismic Rupture
cards.text: Seismic Rupture deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
cards.flavor: The shaman opened the earth beneath their feet, trapping the survivors within the crevices of Ayagor for Atarka to devour at her leisure.

cards.name: Sprinting Warbrute
cards.text:
Sprinting Warbrute attacks each combat if able.
Dash {3}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

foreignPrintings.name: Bestia de guerra a la carrera

cards.name: Stormcrag Elemental
cards.text:
Trample
Megamorph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The storms of Tarkir awaken more than dragons.

cards.name: Stormwing Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
Megamorph {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Stormwing Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

cards.name: Summit Prowler
cards.flavor:
"Do you not hunt the yetis of the high peaks, stripling? Their meat is as tender as a bear's and their blood as warming as fire. They are prey that will please Atarka."
-Surrak, the Hunt Caller

cards.name: Tail Slash
cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
cards.flavor:
"Kneel before a dragon and you will be spared when it turns to leave."
-Yikaro, Atarka warrior

cards.name: Thunderbreak Regent
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, Thunderbreak Regent deals 3 damage to that player.
cards.flavor: Attracting a dragon's attention may be the last mistake you make.

cards.name: Tormenting Voice
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: A mocking laughter echoed in Ugin's mind. How many centuries had he slumbered, stricken, while Nicol Bolas moved unchallenged among the planes?

cards.name: Twin Bolt
cards.text: Twin Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
cards.flavor: Kolaghan archers are trained in Dakla, the way of the bow. They utilize their dragonlord's lightning to strike their target, no matter how small, how fast, or how far away.

cards.name: Vandalize
cards.text:
Choose one or both -
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"As we have learned from Kolaghan, to ruin is to rule."
-Shensu, Kolaghan rider

cards.name: Volcanic Rush
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The bravest warriors take the shortest path to victory, whatever that path may be."
-Sakta, Atarka hunter

cards.name: Volcanic Vision
cards.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's mana value to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

cards.name: Warbringer
cards.text:
Dash costs you pay cost {2} less (as long as this creature is on the battlefield).
Dash {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Zurgo Bellstriker
cards.text:
Zurgo Bellstriker can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Aerie Bowmasters
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Megamorph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Ainok Artillerist
cards.text: Ainok Artillerist has reach as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it. (It can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"In the Tarkir I once knew, the Abzan revered their ancestor trees. Now, as Dromoka, they cut their finest groves to make weapons."
-Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Ainok Survivalist
cards.text:
Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Ainok Survivalist is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

cards.name: Assault Formation
cards.text:
Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
{G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
{2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Atarka Beastbreaker
cards.text: Formidable - {4}{G}: Atarka Beastbreaker gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
cards.flavor: He scorns the heavy winter garb of lesser warriors, trusting his anger to keep him warm.

cards.name: Avatar of the Resolute
cards.text:
Reach, trample
Avatar of the Resolute enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: It exemplifies the ideals of the Dromoka: strength, unity, and honor.

cards.name: Circle of Elders
cards.text:
Vigilance
Formidable - {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
cards.flavor: They whisper of an ancient hero who saved the dragons of their world.

cards.name: Collected Company
cards.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.flavor: Many can stand where one would fall.

cards.name: Colossodon Yearling
cards.flavor: The colossodon's hard outer shell stops many predators, but with a gentle flip from a dragon, it quickly becomes a meal in a bowl.

foreignPrintings.name: コロッソドンの一年仔

cards.name: Conifer Strider
cards.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor: Atarka's presence thaws the glaciers of Qal Sisma, forcing its elementals to migrate or adapt.

cards.name: Deathmist Raptor
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, you may return Deathmist Raptor from your graveyard to the battlefield face up or face down.
Megamorph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

cards.name: Den Protector
cards.text:
Creatures with power less than Den Protector's power can't block it.
Megamorph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Den Protector is turned face up, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Display of Dominance
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Destroy target blue or black noncreature permanent.
• Permanents you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells your opponents control this turn.

cards.name: Dragon-Scarred Bear
cards.text: Formidable - {1}{G}: Regenerate Dragon-Scarred Bear. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
cards.flavor: Bears are a delicacy for the Atarka. The few that remain are the toughest of their species.

cards.name: Dromoka's Gift
cards.text: Bolster 4. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: The simplest gift from a dragon can be a revered accolade for a human warrior.

cards.name: Epic Confrontation
cards.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor: No matter the timeline, some legends will endure.

cards.name: Explosive Vegetation
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: Despite the flames and devastation of the dragons, Tarkir continued to thrive.

cards.name: Foe-Razer Regent
cards.text:
Flying
When Foe-Razer Regent enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.
Whenever a creature you control fights, put two +1/+1 counters on it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Glade Watcher
cards.text:
Defender
Formidable - {G}: Glade Watcher can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

cards.name: Guardian Shield-Bearer
cards.text:
Megamorph {3}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Guardian Shield-Bearer is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

cards.name: Herdchaser Dragon
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Megamorph {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Herdchaser Dragon is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Dragon creature you control.

cards.name: Inspiring Call
cards.text: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Lurking Arynx
cards.text: Formidable - {2}{G}: Target creature blocks Lurking Arynx this turn if able. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
cards.flavor: Once it has your scent, it will hunt you from the Gurmag Swamp to Ayagor.

foreignPrintings.name: 隠れ潜むエイリンクス

cards.name: Naturalize
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: The remains of ancient civilizations litter the run-down land.

cards.name: Obscuring Aether
cards.text:
Face-down creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{G}: Turn Obscuring Aether face down. (It becomes a 2/2 creature.)

cards.name: Pinion Feast
cards.text: Destroy target creature with flying. Bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor:
"Even paradise is not without tragedies."
-Sarkhan Vol

cards.name: Press the Advantage
cards.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Show your enemies as much mercy as they would show you."
-Surrak, the Hunt Caller

cards.name: Revealing Wind
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You may look at each face-down creature that's attacking or blocking.
cards.flavor:
"The sands obscure the vision of others, but clarify ours."
-Faiso, Dromoka commander

cards.name: Salt Road Ambushers
cards.text:
Whenever another permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
Megamorph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

foreignPrintings.name: Embusqueurs de la Route du sel

cards.name: Salt Road Quartermasters
cards.text:
Salt Road Quartermasters enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Salt Road Quartermasters: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

foreignPrintings.name: Intendants de la Route du sel

cards.name: Sandsteppe Scavenger
cards.text: When Sandsteppe Scavenger enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
cards.flavor: "Sad what passes for a dragon among the Silumgar."

foreignPrintings.name: Charognarde de la steppe de sable

cards.name: Scaleguard Sentinels
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Scaleguard Sentinels enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell.

cards.name: Segmented Krotiq
cards.text: Megamorph {6}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: The list of things a krotiq eats is as long as the krotiq itself.

cards.name: Servant of the Scale
cards.text:
Servant of the Scale enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Servant of the Scale dies, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Servant of the Scale.

cards.name: Shaman of Forgotten Ways
cards.text:
{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Formidable - {9}{G}{G}, {T}: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures they control. Activate only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

cards.name: Shape the Sands
cards.text: Target creature gets +0/+5 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"Dragons in flight seldom expect company."
-Kadri, Dromoka warrior

cards.name: Sheltered Aerie
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."
cards.flavor: Dromoka's scalelords patrol the skies over Arashin, offering her people safety from the harsh world.

cards.name: Sight of the Scalelords
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control with toughness 4 or greater get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The Silumgar creep around our borders and infiltrate our aeries. We must remain ever watchful."
-Golran, Dromoka captain

foreignPrintings.name: Visión de los señores de escamas

cards.name: Stampeding Elk Herd
cards.text: Formidable - Whenever Stampeding Elk Herd attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Atarka use them not just for food, but also to clear away snow, trees, and enemy forces.

cards.name: Sunbringer's Touch
cards.text: Bolster X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn. (To bolster X, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put X +1/+1 counters on it.)

cards.name: Surrak, the Hunt Caller
cards.text: Formidable - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The greatest honor is to feed Atarka."

foreignPrintings.name: Surrak, la Voz de la caza
狩猟の統率者、スーラク

cards.name: Tread Upon
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Boasting impenetrable defenses only draws the most tenacious of attackers."
-Yikaro, Atarka warrior

cards.name: Arashin Sovereign
cards.text:
Flying
When Arashin Sovereign dies, you may put it on the top or bottom of its owner's library.
cards.flavor: Dromoka dragons foster trust among their subjects, while the other clans must spend their time quelling rebellion.

cards.name: Atarka's Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Your opponents can't gain life this turn.
• Atarka's Command deals 3 damage to each opponent.
• You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain reach until end of turn.

cards.name: Boltwing Marauder
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When battling the Kolaghan, consider yourself lucky if lightning strikes the same place only twice.

cards.name: Cunning Breezedancer
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cunning Breezedancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"That which is beautiful in form can also be deadly."
-Ishai, Ojutai dragonspeaker

cards.name: Dragonlord Atarka
cards.text:
Flying, trample
When Dragonlord Atarka enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control.

cards.name: Dragonlord Dromoka
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying, lifelink
Your opponents can't cast spells during your turn.
cards.flavor: Dromoka's followers forsake blood ties so that they may join a greater family.

cards.name: Dragonlord Kolaghan
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Other creatures you control have haste.
Whenever an opponent casts a creature or planeswalker spell with the same name as a card in their graveyard, that player loses 10 life.

cards.name: Dragonlord Ojutai
cards.text:
Flying
Dragonlord Ojutai has hexproof as long as it's untapped.
Whenever Dragonlord Ojutai deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Dragonlord Silumgar
cards.text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Dragonlord Silumgar enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature or planeswalker for as long as you control Dragonlord Silumgar.
cards.flavor: Silumgar never passes up an opportunity to add to his opulence.

cards.name: Dromoka's Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Prevent all damage target instant or sorcery spell would deal this turn.
• Target player sacrifices an enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

cards.name: Enduring Scalelord
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.
cards.flavor: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

cards.name: Harbinger of the Hunt
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{R}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
{2}{G}: Harbinger of the Hunt deals 1 damage to each other creature with flying.
cards.flavor: An Atarka dragon's exhale cooks what its inhale consumes.

cards.name: Kolaghan's Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target player discards a card.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Kolaghan's Command deals 2 damage to any target.

cards.name: Narset Transcendent
cards.text:
[+1]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
[−2]: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, it gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
[−9]: You get an emblem with "Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells."

cards.name: Necromaster Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Necromaster Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token and each opponent mills two cards.

cards.name: Ojutai's Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• You gain 4 life.
• Counter target creature spell.
• Draw a card.

cards.name: Pristine Skywise
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Pristine Skywise. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The elite of Ojutai's brood, the skywise see their enemies as puzzles to be solved.

cards.name: Ruthless Deathfang
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor:
"Bring forth the dead, their skull-grins and rattle-bones. We will feast upon their wailing ghosts."
-Silumgar, translated from Draconic

cards.name: Sarkhan Unbroken
cards.text:
[+1]: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color.
[−2]: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
[−8]: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Savage Ventmaw
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

cards.name: Silumgar's Command
cards.text:
Choose two -
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

cards.name: Swift Warkite
cards.text:
Flying
When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Ancestral Statue
cards.text: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.

cards.name: Atarka Monument
cards.text:
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Atarka is worshipped and fed by her subjects at Ayagor, the Dragon's Bowl.

cards.name: Custodian of the Trove
cards.text:
Defender
Custodian of the Trove enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Silumgar delights in repurposing the treasures of other clans to serve his own ravenous greed.

cards.name: Dragonloft Idol
cards.text: As long as you control a Dragon, Dragonloft Idol gets +1/+1 and has flying and trample.
cards.flavor: The idols were forged during the time of the Khanfall, when the dragons came to rule Tarkir and its people aligned themselves with the five dragonlords.

cards.name: Dromoka Monument
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{4}{G}{W}: Dromoka Monument becomes a 4/4 green and white Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Dromoka rules her clan from the Great Aerie atop Arashin, the central city of the Shifting Wastes.

cards.name: Gate Smasher
cards.text:
Gate Smasher can be attached only to a creature with toughness 4 or greater.
Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.
Equip {3}

cards.name: Keeper of the Lens
cards.text: You may look at face-down creatures you don't control any time.
cards.flavor:
"It sees all, but it reveals what it sees only to a chosen few."
-Taigam, Ojutai master

cards.name: Kolaghan Monument
cards.text:
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{4}{B}{R}: Kolaghan Monument becomes a 4/4 black and red Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Kolaghan has no lasting home, but her disciples leave relics to mark her conquests.

cards.name: Ojutai Monument
cards.text:
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
{4}{W}{U}: Ojutai Monument becomes a 4/4 white and blue Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Ojutai spends time at all his strongholds, but he most favors Cori Stronghold for his meditation.

cards.name: Silumgar Monument
cards.text:
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{4}{U}{B}: Silumgar Monument becomes a 4/4 blue and black Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Silumgar dominates his clan from a fortress on the Marang River, where he rests upon piles of treasure.

cards.name: Spidersilk Net
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
cards.flavor: "Dragons are our betters, but we will fight them if our dragonlord orders it."

cards.name: Stormrider Rig
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Stormrider Rig to it.
Equip {2}

cards.name: Tapestry of the Ages
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Abzan, Jeskai, Sultai, Mardu, Temur-names lost to history, yet worthy of further study."
-Narset

cards.name: Vial of Dragonfire
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Vial of Dragonfire: It deals 2 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor: Designed by an ancient artificer, the vials are strong enough to hold the very breath of a dragon-until it's needed.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

cards.name: Haven of the Spirit Dragon
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Haven of the Spirit Dragon: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
